website_summaries.verdict: The best budget pair of armored gloves, with more protection than most other options.
pros: Plastic backing gives the most amount of protection while still retaining a good amount of motion in the fingers
Palms are covered with light fabric for better grip and protection of the underside
Mesh construction on the back is breathable
cons: Full plastic cladding can feel heavy and hot in warm weather or during extreme activities

customer_reviews.title: Dirtbike woods gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are EXACTLY early 90's-late 80's O Neal Ultra Lite Gloves for dirt bikes. They were and are the ultimate offroad glove. Nobody offers nearly as much protection, they are cool because the vents actually work when you are moving and the palms are super tough but thin with fantastic feel. These gloves may not be marketed for dirt bike gloves ,but they still are the best designed dirt bike glove ever produced.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Great for airsoft.
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are the best set of gloves you can get for airsoft. The covering over the top of hand you can barely feel the pellet when it hits you. They are also durable and can take a beating. There is no issue with using the trigger either. I bought two pair because some other reviews had said they would break at the stitching after some use, but the price was still worth it. I have about 250 hours of game time with the first set and they are still holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: CHUCKTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Keep Your Hands Protected
customer_reviews.text: These gloves work great for paintball and airsoft. I took a few hits right on the hand and the glove absorbed all of the impact. The palm has a smooth but grippy enough texture to it. My only negative takeaway from this product is the cuffs are a little short. I wish they were another inch or so longer because they get kind of bunched up under the velcro wristband. Aside from that, they work perfectly for what I needed and I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Sean F

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: Good. I purchased these gloves for my winter airsoft games. The gloves are OK for the price, but the plastic pieces on the outside are quite unwieldy and at times might get you caught on things. The thickness of the trigger finger (with the plastic piece on the back) makes it barely fit into the trigger guard on the gun. So be aware of it.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Soo soft, and protective.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are the best thing ive ever bought for paintball. They paid for themselves when i got shot in the hand 3x in a day, well worth it. The green in which i got mine matched my camo perfectly, and they are soo incredibly soft! They never mentioned how soft these gloves are, its amazing. My only complaint is that the green coloring used to paint the gloves rubbed off on my hand alittle leaving them green where the gun put pressure on my hands for about 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Gloves is pretty durable and keeps your hands from fatigue and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Gloves is pretty durable and keeps your hands from fatigue and the plastic knuckle guard helps...again, you can still feel the impact of the paintball but it will not be as bad if you did not wear gloves. Great glove for the price that's why I gave it four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Seng Yahnson

customer_reviews.title: Big Protected Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves as a gift for my son, who’s gotten into sword fighting (you know, the kind at a Renn Fair?) and these fit him great. He’s got long fingers, so I was worried the large might not quite fit. He gives them a big thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: javamonster

customer_reviews.title: Decent for Airsoft
customer_reviews.text: These limit maneuverability but offer a decent amount of protection for the top of your hand. You might want to buy a couple different gloves and see what you like because you might want more maneuverability. These were a generally ok fit but kinda uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: EliteReviewsUSA

customer_reviews.title: Flexible
customer_reviews.text: i unfortunately can't completely attest to the protective nature of the gloves, since I didn't get shot in the hand while playing, but the gloves fit pretty well. The backing is easy to move in, and fit well into the trigger guard of my Tippmann A5. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jai

customer_reviews.title: Gd beginner product..
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping..these are plastic and not the soft mold of more expensive brands but they fit well and do the job. Good as a starter pair to see if its an activity of longevity or a quick fad. Flexible, doesnt interfere w trigger.
customer_reviews.author: Rosita

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of being shot on my fingers and decided to get these. They look and fit a little funny, but they are pretty good quality, could easily get messed up though. Amazing for the price. Edit: Bought another pair for my brother because he loved them so much, I also did a waterproof treatment, which the gloves took easily
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for airsoft
customer_reviews.text: Bought these gloves for airsoft. The gloves are decently thick for padding but still allow for a tactile feel. I have to mention that they are pretty comfortable as well even though they have a bulky shape. The glove does not have leather but a suede type of fabric on the inside palm and finger region. There is a hook to connect both gloves together so they don't get lost easily. Lastly, they have a strap attached to keep them snug on your hands. Overall not a bad price for gloves being put to use in airsoft, I'm pretty sure these will hold up in snowy conditions as well.
customer_reviews.author: Edward B.

customer_reviews.title: I'd get one size down what you normally wear (unless you like gloves with lots of room)
customer_reviews.text: Very bulky gloves, I'd get one size down what you normally wear (unless you like gloves with lots of room)
customer_reviews.author: Eugil

customer_reviews.title: Defender gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are going to be great for Nerf blaster wars. They will stop my old hands for getting bruised. I think they are a good add to my protection eguipment from my grandson attack. Great thank Happy Papa Harlan I am 73 and still having a ball with him.
customer_reviews.author: harlan cross

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, comfortable, had no problem with the grip, a bit hot for +90 degree weather, but its expected. Good protection, i took two hits to the fingers from around 20 feet, i felt them, but no paine, no bruising. Seem to be very durable, had more then 10 games in them.
customer_reviews.author: Max Russ

customer_reviews.title: Great for Paintball
customer_reviews.text: These are so cool. They are made of flexible material, so that it moves when your fingers move when firing that paintball gun.
customer_reviews.author: Tertia Holeyfield

customer_reviews.title: I like to hold things, this helps.
customer_reviews.text: Now I can hold things better. Hold that rock, hold that airsoft gun, hold that stick, hold that human heart... It all works with V-TAC gloves! BUY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as o
customer_reviews.text: The gloves aren't as comfortable as expected. They function fine but would be great if they were more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kmsmith

customer_reviews.title: for the price, they'll do
customer_reviews.text: use them for airsoft, they are fine. A little baggy in the fingers.
customer_reviews.author: IhateApple

customer_reviews.title: They fit decently and are very comfortable. I would recommend this for costuming
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a Jedi Costume. I am very impressed at the quality for the price. They fit decently and are very comfortable. I would recommend this for costuming. On the subject of airsoft they seem to provide good protection as for paintball, I don't think so.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for airsofting
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly as described and a good price for what you get. After the first couple of knuckle hits while playing airsoft, I got these. Now, I'm not worried about getting hit in the knuckle. You barely feel a thing now. And after a good 10 hours of playing with them, they're still holding up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brett O.

customer_reviews.title: They run big!
customer_reviews.text: Solid gloves! They do run a bit large though. An avg male probably would want a medium. I have avg size hands and they def are a tad too large for shooting gloves.
customer_reviews.author: HydraShock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Prefect for paintball. Protects the fingers whike not inhibiting the movement.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: good glove's
customer_reviews.text: i got these a few time's there good for the money
customer_reviews.author: Shato Lee

customer_reviews.title: fantastic gauntlets
customer_reviews.text: I use these for paintball. Extremely effective, absolutely no sting at all. The plastic on the back flexes fine, and I never feel any pain after extended use as with some other gloves. I do wonder how long they will last before the plastic starts coming off, but for the price you can't beat the shielding. These are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves. A little lose but that was my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves. A little lose but that was my fault for ordering a pair too large for my hands.
customer_reviews.author: StevenB

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are very comfortable and breathable, however they will be able to keep your hands warm in colder weather as well. The plastic protection works but it's kind of cheap and looks like it may fall off after extensive use. Overall these are very nice for how cheap they are, great if you're on a budget!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: I just received and tried them on, very soft ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received and tried them on, very soft sniff the protection seems sound. I haven't tried them on the field, yet, I hope they work..! Only thing is that I believe I'll have to wear something else, under them, as where there is no shell the fabric is very soft..
customer_reviews.author: anna tornello

customer_reviews.title: Very well-made gloves I would recommend this to my friends any day especially for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well-made gloves I would recommend this to my friends any day especially for the price they have clips that clipped together so you don't lose them nice touch ! I'm ready for paintballing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price - the plastic pieces on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought the gloves for fencing (protection against fingers getting hit). Good for the price - the plastic pieces on the knuckles are a lot less stiff than I thought they'd be from the previous reviews. Not as much protection as I was expecting, but adequate nonetheless. Gloves are comfortable and very minimal affect on dexterity.
customer_reviews.author: docmcstuffins

customer_reviews.title: These are the best gloves for airsoft
customer_reviews.text: These are the best gloves for airsoft, I think they could take on a hungry beaver. I bought these for my kid and I have used them, they are like a micro fiber with plastic in the areas that matter. Works great wet and dry.
customer_reviews.author: JMo

customer_reviews.title: A must!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would maybe uncomfortable, but actually fits very well. I searched for measures in the brand website and it was correct. Already received my first shot in my right hand and covered it very well. It hurted me, but didn't make a bruise. Surely it would be a lot more painful if I had not been wearing it in that moment.
customer_reviews.author: Alex D.

customer_reviews.title: "Buckets on!"
customer_reviews.text: Currently building a mandolorian Costume when I was searching for proper gloves. I came across these and I couldn't resist. Once I received them I tried them one and perfect fit and feel to them. I knew these were the gloves I needed to complete my costume.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: When you’re out fighting zombies, this is a must have! Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Good for Autumn or winter play
customer_reviews.text: Good for Autumn or winter play- Hands get to sweaty and warm in summer
customer_reviews.author: YankeeBlueFalcon

customer_reviews.title: TBD
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to go with my Batman costume for my hands. Will be able to give a better review after wearing them for a day
customer_reviews.author: Jazz Jones

customer_reviews.title: the armor on the back is cheap its hollow under ...
customer_reviews.text: the armor on the back is cheap its hollow under the rubber armor I got shot with a paintball once in the hand from about 45 feet away in the back of the hand it still made my hand bleed the ref cronographed his marker his was 10 below the limit it's just cheaply made hard to make a fist
customer_reviews.author: Frances Sisco

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves for cosplay
customer_reviews.text: Got these gloves to use as robot hands for a prospective cosplay, so I dunno about their practical purposes. They look great and feel great, though, and they're not too bulky that you can't hold things and gesture with them. Worth the price for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan Hodge-McNutt

customer_reviews.title: Good knuckle protection without getting in the way
customer_reviews.text: Good knuckle protection without getting in the way. They seem to be made of something like felt which snags easy on Velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of gloves for airsoft
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of gloves for airsoft! Provide some good coverage and rarely do I feel anything. Plus they look cool!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pull trigger.
customer_reviews.text: I really like that the material is designed for the fingertips to pull away from the plastic finger covers. This allows just your finger to go into the trigger guard reducing any idea that these gloves are bulky. The craftsmanship is top notch. I use them for Lazer Tag which has a shield button in front of the trigger and had no difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: Sabastian78

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: After a few months the finger tips are starting to rub through. Very flexible and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Venom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I don't only use it for airsoft I also use it to deal with bitty animals they cant even go through the gloves and well just good protection over all for airsoft or what ever you would need them for.
customer_reviews.author: Syther

customer_reviews.title: Fit is just right
customer_reviews.text: Use these for paintballing and fit is perfect and durable
customer_reviews.author: David Fonseca

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s an okay product but if your thirteen don’t buy medium unless you have huuuge hands
customer_reviews.author: Nick Yamov

customer_reviews.title: Airsoft Play
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves for playing airsoft and I am amazed at how comfortable they are. Great protection from the BB's also.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Spangler

customer_reviews.title: Works and they are comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Can't ask for better gloves, easy to still pick stuff up and are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: mike ikezoe

customer_reviews.title: Protects hands very well
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a full day of airsoft and I am really glad I did. I was shot many times on the hands and it felt like a little tap instead of a sting that might've lasted a few minutes. No welts, no blood, just comfortable hands. I absolutely have to recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: J P

customer_reviews.title: Paintball must have
customer_reviews.text: Great if you are going paintballkng my fingers did not get hurt, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Paintball perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, very comfortable, decent price. I've been hit in the knuckles several times and did not feel a thing! Sprayed a little camo paint on them and it stays, even after washing. After 3 times playing all day, they held up perfect. Necessary investment for paintball!
customer_reviews.author: S. Fegely

customer_reviews.title: Ok for price
customer_reviews.text: They are good for price, the Velcro strap on wrist is awkward and does not feel secure
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are pretty good, very durable, and are very comfortable. The only downside to them, are that there is no padding on the thumb. As a very active airsofter, I've learned that getting shot in the thumb is pretty painful, but overall, the gloves are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: These arrived today, they were PERFECT! Exactly what I was looking for....I even turned around and ordered some more! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Buchers

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Got hit on my fingers while paint balling and didn't feel a thing! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These gloves work very well for airsoft. However, they do not protect well unless you are hit on the plastic part. I highly recommend just because of the low price. These also keep your hands fairly warm if you are playing in colder weather, and the mesh allows air circulation if it is hot out.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Nation

customer_reviews.title: Color is very light.
customer_reviews.text: very light shade of tan. Does not match most airsoft, tan, tactical gear.
customer_reviews.author: Milton A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves were maybe not as comfortable as people had wrote, but after cutting off the annoying tag on the inside that all gloves or clothing has, these felt great on. They come with a hooking thing that keeps the gloves together if you're not using them and so you won't ever lose one unless you're stupid. Finally, they have strap to keep these gloves tight and snug so they won't slip off. Overall, these gloves were very nice, comfortable while being protective, and for a low price, these gloves are a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: good gloves , large was a little smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: everything is fine with these gloves as they seem to be made of good fabric, i have long fingers and skinny hands i usually get a large for all glove sizes, this time a large fit me like most medium would
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: Star Wars ready gloves
customer_reviews.text: I have regular size hand and the Mediums fit just right good for Halloween or normal wear
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Blunt

customer_reviews.title: Quality gloves
customer_reviews.text: They are very moveable, but it has no fingertip protection. It still hurts when you get hit, but definitely helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deals.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for paint balling - got hit - didnt hurt. Good deals.
customer_reviews.author: Af

customer_reviews.title: Bought two pair of these and they work great for me and my son play
customer_reviews.text: Bought two pair of these and they work great for me and my son play. They do a great job of protecting your hands during paintball. I would recommend them to anybody that plays paintball or air soft
customer_reviews.author: Brock Hale

customer_reviews.title: You won't feel much with these on, when playing airsoft
customer_reviews.text: These are probably overkill for airsoft, and more for simunitions, but they work great and you will be well protected. Seem like good quality although we haven't used them for as much airsoft fun as I had hoped to do!
customer_reviews.author: notsoNEWKINDLEUSER

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids.
customer_reviews.text: My son was looking for some cheap airsoft gloves that fit him and have some protection. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Brian and Christi Faure

customer_reviews.title: If you need something to cover your hands, it ...
customer_reviews.text: If you need something to cover your hands, it get the job done. They aren't very duriable thoguh. Wore them through 3 airsoft sessions, and they already started tearing at the seams.
customer_reviews.author: AlaskanGuy

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased
customer_reviews.text: Just as described and recieved very quickly. These fit pretty true to size. They are very comfortable and allow you full mobility of your fingers and hands. They are also exceptionally well made.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: great fit and love the movement on them also a great look
customer_reviews.author: Nico G.

customer_reviews.title: Shipment arrived fast the back of them is raised hard like rubber.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly.. Shipment arrived fast the back of them is raised hard like rubber .. It for sure protects your hands.. It has a wrest strap to tighten the gloves down as well.. The cool thing is that you are still able to fell the gun and move your fingers just like normal... Awesome product and with the buy
customer_reviews.author: Christian Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Protect your hands
customer_reviews.text: These work great, first time i played without any hand protection, i got hit in the knuckles alot, and it did not feel good. These have saved my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Money's worth
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Went paintballing and it protected me very well. Didn't feel bruise or sore on my elbows and no scratches. Just put underneath long sleeve if paintball or other rough outdoor activities that can damage it quicker by ripping it. For sports, great. Would recommend to someone if they are just starting. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Drizztz

customer_reviews.title: Best gloves for Master Chief cosplay
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as the pictures. Perfect for my Master Chief cosplay. Also great for paintball
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Martinez Lira

customer_reviews.title: Sweet gloves, they feel well made and work very ...
customer_reviews.text: Sweet gloves, they feel well made and work very nicely. My son uses them to pretend to be swat and I think he could beat me up with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Feels great and the vents work
customer_reviews.text: Feels great and the vents work. You can actually feel the air coming in. The only thing I didn't like is that they're not slim on the fingers, but not an issue at all for handling the trigger.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Rodriguez

customer_reviews.text: These gloves worked very well for the price! I have switched more to speedsoft now but they are AMAZING gloves. I would 100% recommend these gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Average Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't protect thumb
customer_reviews.text: Got shot by a paintball on my thumb and it hurt for a few days. Zero protection. However the other fingers seem to be ok.
customer_reviews.author: NonstopInk

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are a great buy. For a great price you can get ...
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are a great buy. For a great price you can get a sturdy good looking pair of these bad boys. If you end up buying them a little large, they have a strap that easily tightens them. It offers great protection along with a killer look. Overall, well worth the money and I highly recommend this for airsoft.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: but I wouldn't recommend leaving them unprotected
customer_reviews.text: You rarely get shot in the hands in comparison to other parts of the body, but I wouldn't recommend leaving them unprotected. This is fair protection. If you are concerned, wear additional gloves under this.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these gloves for my 13-year-old son to play airsoft he absolutely loves them says they fit well and he can work his guns just fine with them on !
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves for the price and they came a day early!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and comfortable especially for the price great for airsoft would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mason n.

customer_reviews.title: These gloves fit perfect. Very stylish and definitely worth the money spent
customer_reviews.text: These gloves fit perfect. Very stylish and definitely worth the money spent. The seller provided quick delivery and packages were packaged to help prevent any damage to the product.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: If you don't want to spend a ton of money on nice gloves these are great. A little baggy in the fingers for shooting but they protect your hands and are pretty comfortable. Haven't blown out on me yet
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, Great protection.
customer_reviews.text: Feels good, makes bbs coming out of an airsoft rifle firing 375fps feel like a love tap.

customer_reviews.title: Vary Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Valken is a great brad they use high quality materials in all products. i use this gloves and harnnes. this gloves are very confortable and perfect fit. protect yours hands in the flied

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and looks better than the picture.
customer_reviews.text: The picture here makes it appear bulky, but in person, it looks very fitted and tactical. I love it. My fingers have been hit various times (airsoft), but I still have never felt the sting from bb's on my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy

customer_reviews.title: They arrived with one finger not glued down. Too ...
customer_reviews.text: They arrived with one finger not glued down. Too much trouble to try and get it fixed through Amazon/Valken, so I'll just glue it down myself.
customer_reviews.author: William D. Colburn

customer_reviews.title: Very good looking and comfortable gloves.
customer_reviews.text: I really like how the gloves looked and that after a year they are still in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Velveth Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Right for the price but buy at your own risk
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves and I have to say they are pretty nice except for the holes cut into them I opened them all excited and when I saw them the craftsman ship is absolutely horrible on the holes , the material however is very comfortable but the holes on the fingers are no where near consistent i could have done a better job if I had used my own razor but they did however arrive a day early but the last thing is mine also had a defect not a very big deal but makes them look even more goofy looking But I got what unpaid for just be careful these may not be the ones for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... fibers and they got all over my hand dont waste your moneythey look cool but the are
customer_reviews.text: ibought these and it said doni inhale the fibers and they got all over my hand dont waste your moneythey look cool but the are awful
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality, my ONLY issue is that the material on the thumb sticks to the velcro on my mag pouch. Other than that, great gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, like it!
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the product based on its price
customer_reviews.author: Yiting hao

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality. A little to big for me, I bought a size up. But overall, keeps the BBs away. Painless. Product was as described. Shot at point blank with GBB Pistol, could not feel it. Amazing Product. Would be 5 star if size was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: KevLo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, semi light weight
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, semi light weight, nice Velcro strap to adjust tightness around the wrist. Size does run slightly big but still fits nice. Can't beat the price point!
customer_reviews.author: Bill B.

customer_reviews.title: ... from tip to palm the medium should fit perfectly fine. If you have smaller wrists
customer_reviews.text: If your hands are a bit over 7 inches from tip to palm the medium should fit perfectly fine. If you have smaller wrists, there is a fastener to tighten the glove to your liking.
customer_reviews.author: N A

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are exactly what I was looking for. If you are going to be playing outdoors then these are for you. Getting shot in the finger in an airsoft game when its cold out doesn't feel too great. The plastic armor works perfectly to protect them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Paintball Gloves that get the job done.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, they work admirably. The exterior protection of plastic does a good job of lowering the pain of knuckle shots.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit good and they feel good. The only downside they smell terrible out of the package
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel s.

customer_reviews.title: they are actually really good, please buy these
customer_reviews.text: VARY GUD IT DONT LET ME GET HORT IN ERSOFT I RATE 5 PIgGys, AND PLEASE rAISE the PriCe TherE toO ChEap. - This is a joke, they are actually really good, please buy these. -Peter M. Airsoft fanatic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Was happy with the gloves. Fit was right and hard plastic does a great job of protecting my hands. I like the Velcro straps. Gave three stars because some of the seams on the fingers started coming unsewn the second time I wore them.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Gibson

customer_reviews.title: awesome gloves
customer_reviews.text: ordered these gloves.they can in the mail quick. awesome fit and style. can't wait to show my friends. thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: RetroDad
